Name: Elderberry
Description: Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!

DescriptionLocalization.es: ¡Tu madre era un hámster y tu padre olía a bayas de saúco!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 감기치료제로 쓰이기도 한 자주빛 검은색 작은 베리
DescriptionLocalization.de: Wird zu Saft gepresst, der bei Erkältungen hilft!
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 「Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!」※モンティ・パイソンより
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Sua mãe era um hamster e seu pai cheirava a sabugueiro!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 你妈妈是一只仓鼠，那你的父亲闻起来有一股接骨木的气味！（原句的英文这是一句在外国骂人的话）接骨木主要具有中医药用途。
